Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as a means for the government to censor and control freedom of expression.
There is a belief that the government will not be subject to the same scrutiny and consequences as the public.
The submission argues for equal accountability for misinformation between the government and the public.
The author believes in setting standards or codes of conduct that apply to everyone, including government officials.
Main Themes: Equality in the application of rules
Notable Quotes: I believe both the Federal and State governments want to play big brother and completely censor us and shut down freedom of expression.
I believe ones ability to speak freely should not be legislated!
